Name: Perfect Summit Manhattan
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A riff on a Dry Manhattan given extra depth by the addition of dessert wine and whiskey bitters.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Pilar Zeglin at Summit Restaurant Bar in Cincinnati, USA, courtesy of Ardent Spirits. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Perfect Summit Manhattan contains 258 calories
